# vtmn-button

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property  | Attribute | Description                | Type                                                                                                | Default     |
| --------- | --------- | -------------------------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `size`    | `size`    | The size of the button.    | `"large" \| "medium" \| "small" \| "stretched"`                                                     | `'medium'`  |
| `variant` | `variant` | The variant of the button. | `"conversion" \| "ghost" \| "primary" \| "primary-reversed" \| "secondary" \| "secondary-reversed"` | `'primary'` |
